pageProps.title: Building Real-time Applications with Node.js, Express.js, and Socket.io
pageProps.metaDesc: In the world of web development, real-time applications are becoming increasingly popular. They allow users to experience the instant gratification of interacting with applications that respond in real-time. Node.js, Express.js, and Socket.io are three technologies that are essential for building real-time applications. In this article, we'll discuss how to use these technologies together to create real-time applications.
